author: Special Correspondent
text:
Estranged husband of Tirupur MP V. Sathyabama on Wednesday charged the latter of attempting to ‘murder’ him.

Vasu (48), a resident of Siruvalur, told reporters at Gobichettipalayam that his wife, in her capacity as Member of Parliament, was wielding her political influence to make his life miserable over the last one-and-a half year after ‘being forced’ to walk out of family.

He alleged that she had been ‘neglecting and ill-treating’ him.

When contacted, Ms. Sathyabama said she was not interested in speaking anything about personal matters in family.
title: MP’s estranged husband fears threat to life
